SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package controller

Class AdministratorController

java.lang.Object
controller.AdministratorController
public class AdministratorController extends Object
Controller class for managing administrator-related operations. Handles inventory, staff, and replenishment request functionalities.

    • addStock

      public void addStock(String medicine, int amount, int level) throws IOException
      Adds stock for a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicine - the name of the medicine.
      amount - the quantity to add.
      level - the alert level for the medicine.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • removeStock

      Parameters:
      medicine - the name of the medicine to remove.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • replenishStock

      public void replenishStock(int requestID) throws IOException
      Approves a replenishment request by updating the inventory and marking the request as completed.
      Parameters:
      requestID - the ID of the replenishment request.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • viewStaff

      public List<User> viewStaff(String filter) throws IOException
      Retrieves a list of staff based on a given filter.
      Parameters:
      filter - the criteria to filter staff members (e.g., "All", "Doctor", "Pharmacist", "Admin", "Male", "Female", "20", "30", "40").
      Returns:
      a filtered list of User.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • addAdmin

      public void addAdmin(String userid, String name, String role, String password, String gender, String age, String staffemail, String staffcontact) throws IOException
      Adds a new administrator to the system.
      Parameters:
      userid - the unique ID of the administrator.
      name - the name of the administrator.
      role - the role of the administrator.
      password - the password for the administrator.
      gender - the gender of the administrator.
      age - the age of the administrator.
      staffemail - the email of the administrator.
      staffcontact - the contact number of the administrator.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • removeAdmin

      public void removeAdmin(String userID) throws IOException
      Removes an administrator from the system by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the administrator to remove.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • updateStaffInfo

      public void updateStaffInfo(String role, String staffId) throws IOException
      Updates the contact information of a staff member based on their role and ID.
      Parameters:
      role - the role of the staff member (e.g., "Admin", "Doctor", "Pharmacist").
      staffId - the ID of the staff member.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
